feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 11:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
